lessonPlans.title: Grade 3 Math: Addition & Subtraction for State Tests
lessonPlans.subject: Mathematics
objectives: Master addition and subtraction within 1000 for state testing
Solve multi-step word problems using test-taking strategies
Apply place value understanding to solve problems efficiently
standards: 3.NBT.A.2 - Fluently add and subtract within 1000
3.OA.D.8 - Solve two-step word problems using addition and subtraction
3.NBT.A.1 - Use place value understanding to round whole numbers
activities: Video lesson: Addition within 1000 with place value understanding (10 minutes)
Interactive practice: Subtraction with regrouping strategies (10 minutes)
Guided practice: Two-step word problems with visual models (15 minutes)
Independent practice: State test prep exercises with immediate feedback (10 minutes)
materials: Interactive video: Finding missing addends using place value
Practice exercises: Addition and subtraction within 1000
Word problem worksheets: Two-step addition and subtraction problems
Assessment: Mastery check with 8 problems covering all skills

lessonPlans.title: Grade 3 Reading: Test Prep Reading Comprehension
lessonPlans.subject: English Language Arts
objectives: Master reading comprehension strategies for state tests
Identify main idea and supporting details in test passages
Use context clues to determine word meanings in test questions
standards: RI.3.1 - Ask and answer questions to demonstrate understanding
RI.3.2 - Determine the main idea of a text
RI.3.4 - Determine the meaning of general academic words
activities: Video lesson: Main idea identification strategies (10 minutes)
Interactive practice: Context clues and vocabulary building (15 minutes)
Guided practice: Reading comprehension with immediate feedback (10 minutes)
Independent practice: Test-style passage analysis (10 minutes)
materials: Interactive video: Finding the main idea in informational texts
Practice exercises: Context clues and vocabulary
Reading passages: Grade-level appropriate texts with questions
Assessment: Comprehension quiz with 10 questions

lessonPlans.subject: Mathematics
objectives: Master multiplication and division for state testing
Solve multi-step word problems using test strategies

activities: Video lesson: Multi-digit multiplication strategies (15 minutes)
Interactive practice: Division with remainders (10 minutes)

Independent practice: State test prep exercises (10 minutes)
materials: Interactive video: Multi-digit multiplication methods
Practice exercises: Division with remainders
Word problem worksheets: Multi-step multiplication and division
Assessment: Mastery check with 10 problems

lessonPlans.title: Grade 4 Reading: Test Prep Text Analysis
lessonPlans.subject: English Language Arts
objectives: Master text structure analysis for state tests

RI.4.7 - Interpret information from visual elements

Interactive practice: Cause and effect relationships (10 minutes)

Independent practice: Test-style text analysis (10 minutes)

Practice exercises: Cause and effect identification

Assessment: Text structure analysis with 12 questions

lessonPlans.title: Grade 5 Math: Fractions & Decimals for State Tests
lessonPlans.subject: Mathematics
objectives: Master fraction and decimal operations for state testing
Convert between fractions, decimals, and percents efficiently
Solve real-world problems involving fractions and decimals

Interactive practice: Multiplying fractions (10 minutes)

Practice exercises: Decimal operations
Conversion worksheets: Fractions, decimals, and percents
Assessment: Mastery check on fraction and decimal operations

lessonPlans.title: Grade 6 Math: Ratios & Proportions for State Tests

objectives: Master ratio and proportion concepts for state testing
